typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Year as string,
		Month as string,
		Country as string,
		Calorie_category as string,
		Flavor as string,
		Zone as string,
		Product_code as string,
		Product_name as string,
		Sales as float '###.##'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Year,
		Month,
		Country,
		Calorie_category,
		Flavor,
		Zone,
		Product_code,
		Product_name,
		Sales
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Year = year(toDate(Year))) ~> DerivedColumn1
